snippet: A federal judge has temporarily blocked an Oklahoma compounding pharmacy from selling a drug to the Missouri Department of Corrections for use in a Feb. 26 execution.
abstract: Federal judge temporarily blocks an Oklahoma compounding pharmacy from selling a drug to the Missouri Dept of Corrections for use in the execution of Michael Taylor.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has temporarily blocked an Oklahoma compounding pharmacy from selling a drug to the Missouri Department of Corrections for use in a Feb. 26 execution.

headline.main: Missouri: Judge Blocks Sale of Drug for Execution
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Judge Blocks Sale of Drug for Execution
